title: Weatherly
summary: A simple weather dashboard that shows current conditions and a 5‑day forecast.
description: Weatherly is a learning project focused on working with public APIs and rendering clean UI.
It demonstrates asynchronous JavaScript (fetch), basic error handling, and responsive design patterns.

title: TaskLite
summary: A no‑frills to‑do list with localStorage persistence and keyboard shortcuts.
description: TaskLite emphasizes DOM manipulation, data modeling, and accessibility (labels, focus states).
It stores data locally so the app works offline and includes basic keyboard navigation.

title: Recipe Finder
summary: Search recipes by ingredient and bookmark favorites for later.
description: Recipe Finder is a practice app that filters, searches, and presents a card-based grid of results.
Focus is on component-like structure with vanilla JS and a clean, responsive layout.
